column1:
share on x beverly chiddix sligar. jun 10 at 8:03 pm betty was my friend of nearly 30 years. she had a servants heart! if there was a need or a job to be done she was there. she loved her family and was so proud of each and everyone of them. i will miss her so very much but there are so many great memories of her and some of the messes she got us into. thanks the the petrock family for sharing this crazy awesome woman with all the many friends that love her and will miss her! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 10 at 8:01 pm gift of grace bouquet was purchased for the family of bettie lan petrock. share on x jm jay moughon. jun 10 at 7:06 pm bettie petrock always served others. she never sought the limelight and worked hard to improve the lives of others. bettie always offered words of encouragement to everyone. bettie loved her family and was proud of the accomplishments of her children and her grandchildren. you will never find a wife more devoted to her husband, tom. only her love for the lord was greater than her love for her family. we should all be like bettie. my life is so much richer from knowing her, and i will pray for my good friend, tom. jay moughon. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 12. 10:00 am - 12:00 pm kindred funeral home400 union boulevard. englewood, oh, us, 45322. get order flowers now for bettie's visitation service. jun 12. 12:00 pm kindred funeral home400 union boulevard. englewood, oh, us, 45322. get order flowers now for bettie's service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe kindred funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
